channel.title: Sword attack's and stances
channel.description:
Right, first off, thanks for bothering to look at this ;) But, i have a few problems, or slight annoyances, that are;
1. When i equip a custom godsword, it holds it like an ordinary sword... like this: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/39/errro1c.jpg/][IMG]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/617/errro1c.jpg[/img][/URL]
BUT, what i want it to be held like is this:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/853/ghfgdhgf.jpg/][IMG]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/1650/ghfgdhgf.jpg[/img][/URL]
I hope someone can help with that :)
And, number 2;
When i make my custom whips, they seem to not attack in the normal 'whip' fashion... :S Take a look: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/708/errororo.jpg/][IMG]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/8721/errororo.jpg[/img][/URL]
compared to the normal whip
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/513/gtrgt.jpg/][IMG]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/1655/gtrgt.jpg[/img][/URL]
I hope someone can help me with these, as it would be greatly appriciated :)
